title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
description: In New York City in 1939, a reporter discovers that world's leading scientists are vanishing mysteriously and teams up with a skilled pilot and daring associate to uncover the truth and stop a made scientist out to achieve world domination. Original. (A Paramount Pictures film, releasing Summer 2004, written & directed by Kerry Conran, starring Jude Law, Gwyneth Paltrow, Giovanni Ribisi, Ling Bai, & Angelina Jolie) (Science Fiction & Fantasy)
author: Kevin J. Anderson
